page.title: 05CLIFF PATH
page.content: The cliff path between Shanklin and Sandown is a very attractive walk for all tourists.Along the path there are many features including the sea wall, putting green,Winchester House and cafes.There is easy access to the beach from the cliff path and there are many benchseats from which you get an excellent view of the seafront and Sandown Bay. There is a picnic area just beside the putting green,which has eighteen holes.You can walk along the sea wall and enjoy the view of Culver cliff and Sandown.The cafes supply refreshments of all kinds,where you can sit at ease. Many tourists stay at hotels along the cliff top,which make best of their gardens.The cliff top is always a place where tourists like to walk and enjoy the views.
